title.rendered: Eolus completes sales transaction with BKW for 125 MW Swedish wind projects

content.rendered:
Eolus has sold the wind power projects Skallberget/Utterberget, Tjärnäs and Rosenskog, totalling 125 MW, to BKW. The projects are under construction and commercial operation is planned for the fourth quarter 2023.

The transaction covers all the shares in the project companies at an enterprise value of EUR 189.3 million. Eolus will manage the construction of the wind farms under a Construction Management Agreement on behalf of BKW. Eolus will also provide technical, operational and administrative services for the wind farm on a long-term contract.

Eolus is one of the leading developers of renewable energy in the Nordics. Eolus is active in the whole value chain from development of green field projects to construction and operation of renewable projects and offers attractive and competitive investments in the Nordic and Baltic countries, Poland and the United States.

Eolus was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in connection with the transaction.
